````{r, echo = F}
Kurse <- read_xlsx("KurseMscECMX.xlsx", skip = 3, sheet = "Kurslisten") %>%
  distinct(Kurs, Ort, .keep_all = T) %>% 
  mutate(Course = paste("<a href='", 
                              `Link aktuelle VeranstaltungsÃ¼bersicht`, 
                              "'>", 
                              Kurs,
                              "</a>", 
                              sep = "")) %>% 
  rename(Location = Ort) %>%
  select(Course, Location, Section)

kable(Kurse, escape = F, table.attr = 'id=\"table_id\"') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = T, 
                bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive")) %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = F, width = "25em") %>%
  column_spec(2, border_right = F)
```
